summary: "Family Feud" is an American TV game show where two families guess the most popular answers to survey questions to win money and prizes. Created by Mark Goodson, it first aired in 1976 and has had several hosts, including Richard Dawson, Ray Combs, and Steve Harvey. The show has been very popular, especially after Harvey became the host in 2010, making it one of the top syndicated shows in the U.S. It's also been adapted in many countries and has home editions as board games and video games.
title: Family Feud
